question: Which tech giant has launched ‘K-12 Education Transformation Framework’ to facilitate digital transformation of schools in India?
explanation: Microsoft has launched its \'K-12 Education Transformation Framework\' to facilitate comprehensive digital transformation of schools in India. The framework consists of four pillars -- Leadership and policy, Modern teaching and learning, Intelligent environments and Technology blueprint. The purpose of the framework is to provide education leadership, government decision-makers, teachers and most importantly learners, tools to achieve the ambitious change many schools seek, and to thoughtfully integrate technology in powerful and productive ways.
